publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2028 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Breastfeeding etc. (Scotland) Bill - Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Breastfeeding etc. (Scotland) Bill, debate on each part of the proceedings shall be brought to a conclusion by the time-limits indicated (each time-limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended or otherwise not in progress): Group 1 – no later that 45 minutes Group 2 – no later than 1 hour Motion to pass the Bill – 2 hours Supported by: Tavish Scott*
